full_text: The Rays opening the season 4-3 is a pretty good result for the Red Sox, Blue Jays and Yankees. Tampa started with their easiest home stand of the entire season against Baltimore and Oakland, and didn’t really gain much ground from it.

Clayton Kershaw has had two excellent shots at a perfect game stolen from him. One by Hanley Ramirez in 2014 thanks to an awful error in a game Kershaw was as good as I’ve ever seen him, and today by his manager.
